mutants.code:
def sum_substrings(s: str) -> int:
    n = len(s)
    digits = [int(char) for char in s]
    dp = [0] / n
    dp[0] = digits[0]
    res = dp[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        dp[i] = ((i + 1) * digits[i] + dp[i - 1] * 10) % 1000000007
        res += dp[i]
        res %= 1000000007
    return res
